definition: abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
Edgar Allen Poe (1809-1849), American poet and novelist
pinyin: Ai1 de2 jia1 · Ai4 lun2 · Po1

definition: Edgar Snow (1905-1972), American journalist, reported from China 1928-1941, author of Red Star Over China

sentences.english: Edgars says it is beautiful palace - but that “Riga is better”.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加说这是一座美丽的宫殿，但是里加更美丽。

sentences.english: With Isabella dying, Edgar travels to London to pick up Linton.
sentences.chinese: 伊莎贝拉死后，埃德加去伦敦接回了小林顿。

sentences.english: Edgar, in his anxiety for her, forgot her hated friend.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加一心为她焦急，也忘了她那可恨的朋友。

sentences.english: That is another cousin. His name is Edgar.
sentences.chinese: 那是另一位表亲，他的名字叫埃德加。

sentences.english: Edgar sprang to his unbidden guest, blanched with astonishment and rage.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加冲向这位不速之客，脸色因惊愕与愤怒而发白。

sentences.english: Catherine is delighted to see him although Edgar is not so keen.
sentences.chinese: 凯瑟琳很高兴看见到他，而埃德加却没那么热情。

sentences.english: Edgar returns with Linton who is a weak and sickly boy.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加接回了林顿，他是一个虚弱而多病的男孩。
埃德加不会伤害我们的。

sentences.english: It fails when Edgar makes fun of him and they argue.
sentences.chinese: 当埃德加取笑他的时候，他们发生了争执。

sentences.english: Ballet Rehearsal on the Stage, by Edgar Degas.
sentences.chinese: 芭蕾舞团排演舞台上，由埃德加德加。

sentences.english: He'd be capable of coming to seek me, to tease Edgar.
sentences.chinese: 他可能来找我，好惹惹埃德加。

sentences.english: Edgar arrives back at Thrushcross Grange with Linton.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加带着林顿回到了画眉山庄。

sentences.english: He disappears without trace and, after three years, Edgar and Catherine are married.
sentences.chinese: 他消失的杳无音信，三年后，埃德加和凯瑟琳结婚了。

sentences.english: Edgar had made a slop in his saucer, and scarcely swallowed a mouthful.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加倒了一些在他的碟子里，也咽不下一口。

sentences.english: Edgar says, "They were all born with silver spoons in their mouths."
sentences.chinese: 埃德加说，“他们一出生嘴里就含着金汤勺。”

sentences.english: She has an argument with Ellen which then spreads to Edgar who tries to leave.
sentences.chinese: 她跟艾伦发生了争执，埃德加见状便试图离去。

definition: Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
